name: uathesis
tagline: LaTeX template for thesis/dissertation that adheres to the formatting requirements of the University of Arizona.
body: # The University of Arizona Thesis Template This is a LaTeX thesis template for graduate students at The University of Arizona. This template was last updated in 2013 to match current Graduate College requirements. Please see README.txt for further information. ### Sample
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
